trans-unit.source: Defines the methods called during contract generation that can be used to modify the generated code for an operation.
trans-unit.target: Определяет методы, вызываемые при создании контракта, который может использоваться для изменения созданного кода для операции.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IOperationContractGenerationExtension interface on an operation behavior (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> type) to enable you to modify the code generated when a contract or endpoint is compiled into code.
trans-unit.target: Реализуйте интерфейс IOperationContractGenerationExtension в поведении операции ( <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>типа) чтобы обеспечить возможность изменять создаваемый код при компиляции контракта или конечной точки в код.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> inserts a custom operation behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Как правило, пользовательские <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>вставляет пользовательское поведение операции в <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>коллекции при вызове <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>или <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Implement to modify the code document object model prior to the contract generation process.
trans-unit.target: Реализуйте для изменения объектной модели документа кода до процесса создания контракта.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> inserts a custom operation behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Как правило, пользовательские <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>вставляет пользовательское поведение операции в <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>коллекции при вызове <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>или <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The GenerateOperation method is called once for each contract.
trans-unit.target: Метод GenerateOperation вызывается один раз для каждого контракта.

trans-unit.source: The working context that contains the <xref href="System.CodeDom"></xref> types necessary to modify the generated operation.
trans-unit.target: Рабочий контекст, который содержит <xref href="System.CodeDom"> </xref> типы, необходимые для изменения создаваемой операции.
